1.0.2.name: wordpress/link-markets-ldms
1.0.2.description:
The Link Market's LDMS (Link Directory Management Service) plug-in will manage all the links that have been traded through LinkMarket.com website.

Features

  1. Broken Links will be automatically removed from your directory
  2. The links will be added in the correct category as they are on LM site
  3. You will not have more than 25 links per page
  4. No more FTP uploads to your server
  5. Multi-Verify Feature if you have multiple link requests in the same category that needs to be verified, we will verify up to 25 of them at the same time
  6. With a Add your Site link if someone wants to trade links with you and they are not LM user we will give them an option to sign up and send you automatic link request
  7. Customize your directory using cascading style sheets
